{"id":856262604,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1670439839,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"21 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/856262604/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"8.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        vector <vector<int>> dp;\n        int n1=word1.size();\n        int n2=word2.size();\n        dp.resize(n1+1, vector <int> (n2+1));\n\n        for (int i=0;i<=n1;i++)\n            dp[i][0]=i;\n\n        for(int j=0;j<=n2;j++)\n            dp[0][j]=j;\n\n        for(int i=1;i<=n1;i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=1;j<=n2;j++)\n            {\n                int left=dp[i-1][j]+1;\n                int down=dp[i][j-1]+1;\n\n                int left_down=dp[i-1][j-1];\n\n                if(word1[i-1]!=word2[j-1])\n                {\n                    left_down=dp[i-1][j-1]+1;6;\n                }\n                    \n\n                dp[i][j]=min(left,min(down,left_down));\n            }\n            cout<<endl;\n        }\n\n        return dp[n1][n2];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false}
